task.title: How to write an email
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to write an e-mail in Gmail.

prereq.p: You will have to own a Gmail account, know how to work with an internet browser.

context.p: You will learn how to create and send emails to the people you wish to communicate with.

step.cmd: On the left, click on Compose
(Optional) To change your window size, in the upper corner, click Maximize "" or Exit full screen .
Enter your message. Email you start writing but don't send are automatically saved in Drafts on the left..
Optional) Add attachments, such as Drive files e using Drive or photos .

result.p: You have successfully written and sent the mail.

example.p: You can send emails to communicate with friends or colleagues.
